{"id":488040184,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1619991798,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"60 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/488040184/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"19.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    \n     bool ispali(string &s,int i,int j){\n        for(; i<= j; i++,j--){\n            if(s[i] != s[j]) return 0;\n        }\n        return 1;\n    }\n    bool pali(string &s,int i,int j){\n        while(i <= j){\n            if(s[i]!=s[j]){\n                return ispali(s,i+1,j) | ispali(s,i,j-1);\n            }\n            i++,j--;\n        }\n        return 1;\n    }\n    bool validPalindrome(string s) {\n        int n = s.size();\n        return pali(s,0,n-1);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii"}
